Class TWGameRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.kvirkel.tankwars.game.TWGameRenderer

  • public class TWGameRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    Client painter, draws everything on the client window
    Author:
    Ludwig, Peter, Simon
